sourcesContent:
import React, {Component, useState} from "react"; import {variables} from "../Variables"; export class Muscle extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { muscles: [], thisTitle: "NotChanging", Name: "", Category: 0 } } refreshList() { fetch(variables.MUSCLE_API_URL) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => this.setState({muscles: data})) } componentDidMount() { this.refreshList(); } changeMuscleName = (e) => { this.setState({Name : e.target.value}); } addClick(){ this.setState({ thisTitle: "Add Muscle", Id:0, Name:"" }); } editClick(muscle){ this.setState({ thisTitle : "Add Muscle", Id:muscle.Id, Name:muscle.Name }); } render() { const { muscles, Id, thisTitle, Name, Category } = this.state const categoryConvert = ["Arms", "Back", "Core", "Legs"] return (

Muscle Page

{muscles.map(mus => )}
ID Name Category
{mus.Id} {mus.Name} {categoryConvert[mus.Category]}
{thisTitle}
Name
{Id === 0? :null } {Id === 0? :null }
) } }
